channel.title: Annoying run server error
channel.description:
First of all let me say i would like for someone experienced to do this over teamviewer, my runserver.bat freezes all the time, no matter what source, 508's, 317's, anything freezes when i run the server, but i can run clients and everything.
Then when the rune server CMD freezes, its impossible to exit, i have every java update ( so i think) and yea it's just really annoying, i would LOVE some help really, i have server running experience, i use to run servers all the time, and now all the sudden i cant anymore, so if anyone has TeamViewer and would like to help, that would be great, Thanks!!

item.title: Annoying run server error

item.description:

could it perhaps by and chace be my MYSQL?

item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

make sure your not over-using your computer. try closing every window and running the server, if it still freezes, idk what to tell you
